playerList.name: atari7800 - RetroArch 64 - prosystem
playerList.amStartArguments:
-n com.retroarch.aarch64/.browser.retroactivity.RetroActivityFuture
  -e ROM {file.path}
  -e LIBRETRO /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/cores/prosystem_libretro_android.so
  -e CONFIGFILE /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files/retroarch.cfg
  -e IME com.android.inputmethod.latin/.LatinIME
  -e DATADIR /data/data/com.retroarch.aarch64
  -e APK /data/app/com.retroarch.aarch64-1/base.apk
  -e SDCARD /storage/emulated/0
  -e EXTERNAL /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.aarch64/files
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top

  -e DATADIR /data/data/com.retroarch.ra32
  -e APK /data/app/com.retroarch.ra32-1/base.apk
  -e SDCARD /storage/emulated/0
  -e EXTERNAL /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.retroarch.ra32/files
  --activity-clear-task
  --activity-clear-top
